title:
Optical Signature of Flat Bands in Topological Hourglass Semimetal
  Nb3SiTe6
authors:
Shize Cao, Cuiwei Zhang, Yueshan Xu, Jianzhou Zhao, Youguo Shi, Yun-Ze
  Long, Jianlin Luo, Zhi-Guo Chen
abstract:
Flat electronic bands in condensed matter provide a rich avenue for exploring
novel quantum phenomena. Here, we report an optical spectroscopy study of a
topological hourglass semimetal Nb3SiTe6 with the electric field of the
incident light parallel to its crystalline ab-plane. The ab-plane optical
conductivity spectra of Nb3SiTe6 single crystals exhibit a remarkable peak-like
feature around 1.20 eV, which is mainly contributed by the direct optical
transitions between the two ab-initio-calculation-derived flat bands along the
momentum direction Z-U. Our results pave the way for investigating exotic
quantum phenomena based on the flat bands in topological hourglass semimetals.
